                                                                         EFSA CONDUCTED BY: MR GORDON YOUNG, AIRWORTHINESS MANAGER
                                                                         LIF
                                                                         MISSION IMPACT ASSESSMENT: NIL MISSION IMPACT
                                                                         MOA AUTHORISED DELEGATE ENDORSEMENT FOR MISSION: N/A
                                                                         DEFERRED DEFECT CONSIDERATIONS: THE CSMU PRESERVES FLIGHT
                                                                         DATA IN THE EVENT OF AN ACCIDENT AND DOES NOT HAVE ANY
                                                                         IMMEDIATE IMPACT ON THE SAFETY OF FLIGHT. THE ONLY HAZARD
                                                                         APPLICABLE TO THIS DEFECT IS THE POTENTIAL FOR THE CSMU
                                                                         TO COME LOOSE AND DAMAGE THE NEARBY AIRCRAFT STRUCTURE OR
                                                                         SYSTEMS.
                                                                         LIMITATIONS: NIL
                                                                         ADDITIONAL COMMENTS / SMR / SSI REQUIREMENTS: N/A.
                                                                         LCN / FLCN: A/00
                                                                         POD: R2
                                                                         AUTH: BAE LIF OM DDA C. HOLLINSHED BAE16011 B1.
 
                                                                         bae14009     05JAN23     01:54:17
                                                                         DD CLASSIFICATION TYPE - WITH A COA: TECHNICAL DEFERRED
                                                                         DEFECT - 145 MO EFSA
                                                                         REASON - MAINTENANCE EFFICIENCY
                                                                         ENDANGERS FLIGHT SAFETY ASSESSMENT - NO CREDIBLE FLIGHT
                                                                         SAFETY RISK
                                                                         FWD AND REAR POLYURETHANE ANTI VIBE MOUNTS FOUND TO BE
                                                                         DEGRADED. THE CSMU HAS
                                                                         4 ANTI-VIBE MOUNTS LOCATED AT ALL LOCKING AND LOCATING
                                                                         POINTS USED TO LOCK THE CSMU INTO THE A/C
                                                                         TRAY.DETERIORATION OF ANY OF THE ANTI-VIBE MOUNTS AND
                                                                         FRAGMENTATION OF THE ANTI-VIBE MOUNTS LEFT UNDETECTED CAN
                                                                         CAUSE REDUCED TENSION ON
                                                                         THE SELF-LOCKING FASTENERS HOLDING THE CSMU WITHIN THE
                                                                         CSMU TRAY. THIS COULD CREATE THE POTENTIAL FOR CSMU TO
                                                                         BECOME LOOSE. THE CSMU SECURITY HAS BEEN CHECKED AND IS
                                                                         FIRMLY LOCKED IN AND ASSESSED AS SERVICEABLE FOR FLIGHT.
